stories.Title: Everything you need to know about GPT
stories.Description: It's still possible to learn about how artificial intelligence works, whether it's capable of replacing humans, or if it's simply a useful tool.

stories.Description: Their AI-powered assistant is set to become your ultimate partner in generating ideas, taking notes, organizing information, and more.

stories.Title: Motorola's new budget phone promises great upgrades
stories.Description: Although its reputation was built on exceptional battery life, they have now opted to sacrifice it in favor of incorporating new features such as 5G, a better screen, and a more powerful processor.

stories.Title: The state of security in 2023
stories.Description: Splunk Inc. latest release announces that over half of organizations suffered a Data Breach in the past two years as well as several unplanned downtimes due to Cybersecurity incidents.
stories.Tweet: The state of security in 2023 📦 Splunk Inc. latest release announces that over half of organizations suffered a Data Breach in the past two years as well as several unplanned downtimes due to Cybersecurity incidents. # https://www.cxotoday.com/press-release/state-of-security-2023-report-reveals-increase-in-data-breaches-and-outages-due-to-cybersecurity-incidents/

stories.Title: Amazon keeps pushing forward in the AI race
stories.Description: Their latest move to boost AI development is the AWS Generative AI Accelerator program, a 10-week program that offers mentorship and $300K in AWS credits.

stories.Title: Is not the best time for Apple's mixed-reality headset
stories.Description: Concerns are being raised amongst Apple employees as they prepare for the Worldwide Developers Conference on June 5th, due to the low demand for high-end VR.

stories.Title: The Chrome team welcomes WebGPU
stories.Description: This revolutionary new API for the web offers flexible GPU programming, access to advanced capabilities, and significant benefits such as reduced JavaScript workload and machine learning improvements.
